title: Morning paper
creator_credit: Donald Carter, H. Bruce Woolfe and Gaumont-British Instructional
brief_description: The story of a newspaper during wartime. Shows how the news is gathered and prepared for the press in spite of the threat of bombs. Describes the composition and checking of the pages, the creation of curved steroes to fit the rotary presses and various other tasks that must be completed before the paper can be put to bed.
